snippet.title: Avalon The Game by Danu Games (Unreal Engine fueled MMO/MMORPG game)
snippet.description:
Upcoming Fantasy/Medieval game with cutting-edge graphics.

Avalon is an online multiplayer role-playing game  built in Unreal 4/5. Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players utilize their exclusive game assets to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for game coins, lands, gear  and rare rewards. The game is built around both active earn and passive own-to-earn economies.

Inspired by the legend of King Arthur and the Island of Avalon, this game challenges every player to undertake a thrilling adventure in their quest to ultimately claim their very own seat among the Knights of The Round Table. Along the way, players earn rewards (i.e. NFTs, $AVL tokens) by purchasing, renting, or securing resources as well as collaborating with NFT landowners to acquire and build in-game real estate.

___________________________________

#NFT #Web3 #blockchain #polygon #cryptogames #playtoearn #unrealengine #WAX #P2E
